AreaCompletionMessage.en: To show our gratitude... We'll tidy up as you go.
AreaCompletionMessage.de: Um unsere Dankbarkeit zu zeigen... werden wir aufräumen sobald du gehst.
AreaCompletionMessage.it: Per mostrare la nostra gratitudine... Riordineremo mentre vai avanti.
AreaCompletionMessage.ja: 感謝の気持ちとして…。お片付けをしておきます。
AreaCompletionMessage.pt: Para mostrar nossa gratidão ... Vamos arrumar enquanto você avança.
AreaCompletionMessage.ru: Чтобы выразить нашу благодарность... Мы приберемся после твоего ухода.
AreaCompletionMessage.tr: Minnetarlığımızı göstermek için siz giderken toplayacağız...
AreaCompletionMessage.zh: 为了表示我们对你的感谢... 在你走后我们将会把这里打扫干净.
